hero_description_1: Dandalin da aka raba gari wanda ke canza noma zuwa gasa, mai ba da lada, da kuma gogewar da al'umma ke tafiyar da shi.
hero_description_2: Buɗe damar manoman Afirka ta hanyar fasaha da aikin haɗin gwiwa.
reputation_system_desc: Samun karbuwa don ayyukan ɗorewa kuma ku ci gaba da matsayin ku na ƙwararru.
dao_governance_desc: Shiga cikin mahimman yanke shawara tare da nuna gaskiya da daidaitattun tsarin zaɓe.
land_management_desc: Gudanar da filayen ƙasa na kama-da-wane da kwaikwayon sabbin abubuwan noma.
performance_challenges_desc: Yi gasa a gasa na yanayi da tsare-tsare na haɗin gwiwa don ci gaban noma.
nft_marketplace_desc: Gano da cinikin kadarorin dijital na musamman waɗanda ke wakiltar nasarorin noma da sabbin abubuwa.
defi_yield_farming_desc: Haɓaka dawowar kuɗin ku ta hanyar sanyawa kadarorin dijital da ba da gudummawa ga tafkunan ruwa.
copyright: AfriCrop DAO. Duk haƙƙoƙi an kiyaye su.
